scripts.validate: npm run lint:md && npm run lint:spelling
scripts._comment_docs:index: Generates the main index file for the documentation (INDEX.md).
scripts._comment_docs:index:output: Generates the documentation index and outputs it to the console instead of writing to a file.
scripts._comment_lint:md: Lints all Markdown files in the project to ensure they follow the rules defined in .markdownlint.yml.
scripts._comment_lint:spelling: Checks for spelling errors in all Markdown files using the cSpell dictionary.
scripts._comment_format: Formats all Markdown, JSON, and YAML files using Prettier to ensure consistent styling.
scripts._comment_validate: Runs all linting and spelling checks to validate the project's documentation.
